Haroon tum nay bhe dosray sahafion ki tarha fazool or jhoot bakwas shoro kardi hai, show kay shoro main jo tum nay batain ki hain kya wo tum ary k against bol sakty ho ? Pori dunya main ary ki zalalat hoi hai lakin Tum bas sabqa govt k against he kuttay ki tarha bhonko gay but such nahi bakwas karo gay.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Kindly stop defending this government and ary k kehne pe usay chukna. Stay with your original content.
